logger.doc:name: Start Logger
logger.message: transactionId:#[vars.transactionId],correlationId:#[vars.correlationId],message:"Before insert register covid case database call" payload:#[payload]

db:stored-procedure.doc:name: Insert Register Covid Case
db:stored-procedure.db:input-parameters: #[{ "source":payload.source, "case_type":payload.caseType, "first_name":payload.firstName, "last_name":payload.lastName, "phone":payload.phone, "email":payload.email, "date_of_birth":payload.dateOfBirth as String{format:"yyyy-MM-dd"}, "national_id":payload.nationalID, "national_id_type":payload.nationalIDType, "street_address":payload.address.streetAddress, "city":payload.address.city, "state":payload.address.state, "postal":payload.address.postal, "country":payload.address.country, "create_date":now() as String {format:"yyyy-MM-dd"}, "update_date":now() as String {format:"yyyy-MM-dd"}, "create_by":"UHIS", "update_by":"UHIS" }]

logger.doc:name: End Logger
logger.message: transactionId:#[vars.transactionId],correlationId:#[vars.correlationId],message:"After insert register covid case database call",payload:#[payload]

logger.doc:name: Start Logger
logger.message: transactionId:#[vars.transactionId],correlationId:#[vars.correlationId],message:Before fetching get covid case by nationalId database call

logger.doc:name: End Logger
logger.message: transactionId:#[vars.transactionId],correlationId:#[vars.correlationId],message:completed fetching get covid case by nationalId database call,payload: #[payload]

logger.message: transactionId:#[vars.transactionId],correlationId:#[vars.correlationId],message:"Before insert update covid case database call" payload:#[payload]

logger.doc:name: End Logger
logger.message: transactionId:#[vars.transactionId],correlationId:#[vars.correlationId],message:"After insert update covid case database call" payload:#[payload]
